JtGl--lPMQRuJvtfxybSoQ.text: An adorable, relaxing and great coffee shop indeed. It's is a bit of a hidden gem. It's a really cute store front in front of other mediocre store fronts.  Haha. But I would recommend. Pastries are delicious. Simply a great spot to enjoy a cup of coffee. Ladies are so sweet here too. It's my first visit to Scotland and they were great. Thanks ladies!

jOI1V5Q1LyK5BzEzujxrtw.text: A hidden jem at the bottom of Leith walk. Great tunes, lots of comfortable couches, and very good coffee :)
